## yum安装mysql >\#安装命令
>yum install mysql-server >\#后台启动
>/etc/init.d/mysqld start & >\#设置本地初始密码
>grant all privileges on *.* to root@'localhost' identified by 'root' with grant option; >\#删除匿名用户 >delete from mysql.user where user = ""; >\#刷新权限
flush privileges; >说明：默认配置文件为 /etc/my.cnf
>\#配置需要注意的事项
>1：iptables >2:授权问题 >3:skip-name-resolve 跳过域名反解析 >4:创建带编码的库CREATE SCHEMA `monitor_log` DEFAULT CHARACTER SET utf8 ;
